testsuite.name: User CRUD
testsuite.system-out: @api Scenario: Create, update and delete user ?[90m# src/test/resources/features/api/get_user.feature:4?[0m ?[32mGiven ?[0m?[32mAPI is ready?[0m ?[90m# api.steps.CommonApiSteps.apiIsReady()?[0m { "id": "69635bcdd06ea1222ed5840f", "firstName": "QA", "lastName": "Automation", "email": "qa_automation_1768119243347@test.com", "registerDate": "2026-01-11T08:14:05.914Z", "updatedDate": "2026-01-11T08:14:05.914Z" } ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI create a new user?[0m ?[90m# api.steps.UserCrudSteps.createUser()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mresponse status code should be ?[0m?[32m?[1m200?[0m ?[90m# api.steps.CommonApiSteps.verifyStatusCode(int)?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32muser id should be returned?[0m ?[90m# api.steps.UserCrudSteps.userIdShouldBeReturned()?[0m { "id": "69635bcdd06ea1222ed5840f", "firstName": "UpdatedName", "lastName": "Automation", "email": "qa_automation_1768119243347@test.com", "registerDate": "2026-01-11T08:14:05.914Z", "updatedDate": "2026-01-11T08:14:06.329Z" } ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI update the user first name to ?[0m?[32m?[1m"UpdatedName"?[0m ?[90m# api.steps.UserCrudSteps.updateUser(java.lang.String)?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mresponse status code should be ?[0m?[32m?[1m200?[0m ?[90m# api.steps.CommonApiSteps.verifyStatusCode(int)?[0m { "id": "69635bcdd06ea1222ed5840f" } ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI delete the user?[0m ?[90m# api.steps.UserCrudSteps.deleteUser()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mresponse status code should be ?[0m?[32m?[1m200?[0m ?[90m# api.steps.CommonApiSteps.verifyStatusCode(int)?[0m
